channel.title: How do you make money?
channel.description:
How do you personally make your money?
Any ways you can think of to make a buck, post here.

item.title: How do you make money?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

i am actually 15 years old but this year i started selling candy and shit to school and this makes sooo much money im actually serious (only cuz we dont have a cafeteria or shop scince i live in dubai plus the people are rich there) i made 4000 dhs = 1500 usd$ in around 7 months now and the thing is its not risky i buy like these jellp pizzas for like 0.5 dhs and i sell them in school for like 3-5 dhs ( i lie and say i bought them for 2 dhs) anywas if ur still in school i highly suggest this method lol or tell ur children to gl

item.title: How do you make money?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Well recently I’ve been flipping older toys on Ebay - and I’ve been doing it for a week and I’ve already made $70 bucks, plus I have a lot of other toys I can still make pretty good cash off of.

I also didn’t mention I have 2 jobs; I mow lawns on the side (30-40 bucks a lawn), and I have a job at a fast food chain getting ~30 hours a week.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make money?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:13, topic:443239”][quote author=casey. link=topic=545926.msg4001899#msg4001899 date=1338139925]
Main income is from Runescape. buy bulk gold and flip. 1b=$180-250(depending on price of gold). Buy about 4-6b daily. So thats about $1k profit a day. Only downside is I don’t get any health benefits, but I’m not too worried about that. Best thing about it is I just bring my ipad with me and can work off it when needed.

So yes, Runescape is basically my job and has allowed me to live extremely nice for the past year.

[/quote]

Not sure if you serious or troll about getting 1b so cheap.[/quote]

He makes $180-$250 flipping 1b, meaning he sells the gold between $0.018-$0.025 higher per million.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make money?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I work a job all year and also pick up another during the summer.

Last summer I played around with airsoft equipment. Essentially bought a gun or a random box with a gun in it from sites, then proceeded to sell them again. Made around $80-100 from a couple guns. Also made like $20 from lending out an M16 that I have just sitting around as a spare. They rent it + some BBs for like $5/hour.

If you have a lot of time, look into making and selling airsoft riot shields for cheaper than a store will sell them for, not even kidding. You literally just need a sheet of plexiglass, some paint or other material, a cheap handle, and some screws. I was going to look into this last summer but never got the time.

Post offers in your local newspaper for lawnwork services or something of the sort.

All of my money that wasn’t an actual job came from airsoft last year. “Merchanting” the guns, renting a gun, and doing mechanical work on guns for others to fix them or tune them up made some money flow. I really enjoyed doing it too.

Read full topic
